content.question: In the first sentence of the sixth paragraph, the author describes her “rocky existence” during high school in order to

choices.label: support the claim that her parents’ absence affected her during her adolescence
highlight the hospitality offered to her by the parents of her friends
suggest that her high school was not sufficiently supportive of students in her situation
balance a discussion of her high school triumphs with an acknowledgement of her challenges

content.answer: support the claim that her parents’ absence affected her during her adolescence

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
